title: Anil Ambani's comeback spree? Reliance forays into Bhutan to set up largest solar plant in the country
description: Reliance Group is entering Bhutan's renewable energy sector by partnering with Druk Holding to set up 1,270 MW solar and hydroelectric projects. This initiative includes a 500 MW solar plant and a 770 MW hydro project. This will mark the largest FDI by an Indian company in Bhutanâ€™s renewable energy sector.
